mdRecord.dcterms:title: Medicine bottle with cap
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Merk & Company, Inc [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Amber glass bottle with screw-on plastic cap. Label reads: "1 oz. Theobromine Sodio-Salicylate Merk." Label number 43055. Also reads: "CAUTION: -To be dispensed only by or on the prescription of a physician, or otherwise used only for manufacturing purposes. Printed in the USA."
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medicine bottles
